directions: , combine the chipotle chilies, lime juice, garlic powder, onion powder, cumin and cilantro. Using a pestle, grind the ingredients together to form a paste. Add three-fourths of the black beans and grind until well mashed. Stir in the remaining beans and season with salt. Serve with tortilla or corn chips for dipping. Makes about 2 1/2 cups.
ingredients: 2 cans (each 15 oz.) black beans, drained and rinsed
Tortilla or corn chips for serving
title: Chipotle-Black Bean Dip
